title: LF Plat+ Top laner for serious team! Must be ranked gold+ in flex for tryouts
body:
Hey everyone, were currently looking for a top laner who is platinum+ to play in a tournament team. You must have a flexible schedule with atleast 3-4 evenings available a week. Other than that, the only other requirement is to be atleast gold in flex as that is how the team will try you out, as well as practice new strategies. If this interests you, add me in game : that dank tank

We are starting tryouts at 8:30 est tonight!

See you then!

replies.body: Hey! I'm currently p5 in flex and p3 in solo queue, I added you! BimBim is the name (:
